work_experience.job_title: AI Scientist â€“ Generative Insights & Clustering Specialist
work_experience.description: Engineered a robust NLP data pipeline leveraging the GPT-4o mini API for PII reduction and data cleaning, combined with intfloat/e5 embeddings in Weaviate to enable advanced clustering. Developed a hybrid geospatial visualization system using ArcGIS Pro and Deck.gl to create interactive maps of complex cluster relationships and topological data. Fine-tuned generative AI models to analyze, summarize, and synthesize multi-source corporate data (tickets, emails, meetings) into actionable summaries and recommendations.
key_responsibilities: Engineered a robust NLP data pipeline for PII reduction and data cleaning
Leveraged GPT-4o mini API and intfloat/e5 embeddings in Weaviate for advanced clustering
Developed a hybrid geospatial visualization system using ArcGIS Pro and Deck.gl
Created interactive maps of complex cluster relationships and topological data
Fine-tuned generative AI models to analyze, summarize, and synthesize multi-source corporate data

work_experience.description: Developed a frontend-based AI proctoring solution using TensorFlow.js and WebGPU, enabling real-time, serverless monitoring for thousands of users and cutting infrastructure costs.
key_responsibilities: Developed a frontend-based AI proctoring solution

work_experience.description: Developed a facial recognition system using Siamese Neural Networks for a B2B AI-driven interview platform, enabling one-shot image recognition and improving performance with data augmentation.
key_responsibilities: Developed a facial recognition system for a B2B AI-driven interview platform

projects.name: GenAgent-Personalized-Career-Assistant-Powered-by-Agentic-AI
projects.description: Architected a full-stack AI career assistant (FastAPI, Streamlit) providing data-driven resume feedback and job application tools. Engineered a multi-feature platform using LLM agents (GPT-4) for resume analysis, rewriting, and cover letter generation. Containerized the application using Docker, ensuring reproducible builds and simplifying deployment.

projects.name: AI Medical Chatbot Using Llama 2
projects.description: Engineered a RAG medical chatbot using Llama 2 and LangChain to provide accurate answers from a PDF knowledge base. Implemented a FAISS vector database, achieving 95% retrieval accuracy and reducing response latency by 50%.

projects.name: AI Large-Scale Candidate Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed a scalable candidate-job matching system using GPT-4o mini and advanced prompt engineering. Built a resume parsing pipeline to minimize input size, reducing inference cost and time. (Part of LineupX Internship)

projects.name: EduNote: AI-Powered Cultural and Location-Based Note Generation from Images
projects.description: Developed an AI tool to transform images of landmarks into travel notes using a fine-tuned DenseNet121 model and APIs (Wikipedia, TripAdvisor). This project was published as a research paper.
